definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The first is how empty it was at al Asad Air Base, where he landed.
sentences.chinese: 第一个就是他落地的阿萨德空军基地空无一人。

sentences.english: O'Bannon was born in Phoenix and raised on Air Force bases around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她出生在凤凰，在世界各地的空军基地成长。

sentences.english: One of the largest air displays in Japan is held annually at Gifu airbase.
sentences.chinese: 日本最大的航空展之一每年都在歧阜空军基地举行。

sentences.english: which seemed to be making for a Royal Air Force Station nearby.
sentences.chinese: 它像是正飞往附近煌一个皇家空军基地。

sentences.english: The Taliban spokesman claims responsibility for the attack on Bagram Air Base .
sentences.chinese: 塔利班发言人称对此次巴格兰空军基地袭击事件负责。

sentences.english: It closed in 1949 as Coolidge Air Force Base.
sentences.chinese: 它于1949年，柯立芝空军基地的关闭。

sentences.english: Fayetteville has the Army's Fort Bragg and Pope Air Force Base.
sentences.chinese: 有军队的布拉格堡和人民空军基地。

sentences.english: The trial system is currently fielded at Dreux AB.
sentences.chinese: 该系统的实验型号当前部署在杜勒克斯空军基地。

sentences.english: We have achieved a great amount of destruction at airfields and air bases.
sentences.chinese: 我们已把机场和空军基地大加破坏。

sentences.english: The pilot landed at Edwards AFB , California, without incident.
sentences.chinese: 飞行员安全降落在加利福尼亚的爱德华兹空军基地。

sentences.english: This is the first flight campaign taking place at the Decimomannu air base in Sardinia, thanks to the precious collaboration with the Ministry of Defence and the Italian Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 本次是第一次在希波曼鲁空军基地进行的飞行。

sentences.english: Capture and hold the rican airbase on Eastern Island.
sentences.chinese: 占领并控制东岛上的美国的空军基地。

sentences.english: The air base at Furstenfeldbruck was the place to be.
sentences.chinese: 菲斯滕费尔德布鲁克空军基地是应该去的地方。

sentences.english: Personal vehicles are not allowed in Andrews AFB.
sentences.chinese: 私人车辆不能进入安德鲁空军基地。

sentences.english: The government of Kyrgyzstan asked parliament to approve the closure of an important American air base, Manas, near the capital, Bishkek.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔吉斯斯坦政府要求议会批准关闭美军空军基地。

sentences.english: Two battalions were disposed for an attack on the air base.
sentences.chinese: 配置两个营的兵力进攻空军基地。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
(of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
